metadata.title: CVE-2017-3106 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Adobe Flash Player versions 26.0.0.137 and earlier have an exploitable typeconfusion vulnerability when parsing SWF files. Successful exploitationcould lead to arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-3106` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 26.0.0.151ubuntu0.16.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 26.0.0.151ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '26.0.0.151ubuntu0.16.04.1').
